channel.title: The Complete List of DevOps Terms And Their Definitions on Tech Terminologies
channel.description: Recent content in The Complete List of DevOps Terms And Their Definitions on Tech Terminologies

item.title: What is a Java Virtual Machine (JVM)?
item.description: In non-technical language, the JVM acts as a bridge or translator.

item.title: What is Java 2 Platform, Enterprise Edition (J2EE)?
item.description: “Java 2 Platform, Enterprise Edition” (J2EE) is a technology that helps developers build powerful and reliable software for big and complex tasks, like managing online stores or banking systems.
